Text: No cue file is needed to hear all the tracks in succession.
I never save the cue-files, what's the use oft them? Usually both tags and filenames indicate trackorder, isn't that 'nuff?

^^^ I think people look CUE files these days to validate the files.  I ran the folder through Audiochecker:

Thanks -wxm-!  I'm looking forward to listening to this...

Which version is this? It has 17 tracks. The Wikipedia link provided shows a 14 track and an 18 track version.

Or in other words, which country is this from? Is this the German edition?

^^^from that same link....

"The DELUXE EDITION will include three additional bonus tracks (four on the Japanese edition)."

14+3=17
Thanks for the deluxe version in FLAC,it sounds awesome.

Great torrent, thanks!

Still keeps me wondering how could we have Deluxe edition of "The Next Day" a week before its launch. :)
